description:
Bandshees issue an ultimatum to Chup: They’ll swap the love potion for the missing side of their mysterious love triangle. With the assistance of pro matchmakers Romano and Julienne, Chup and his friends can’t lose, right?! However, the course of true love doth never run smooth; plus, the Bandshees’ love triangle has its own funky groove...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: セイレーン命懸けの愛
